column4: Does anybody use a usb modem? If yes, does he use a ueagle chipset modem (like Sagem F@st 800)? I ask that, because I want to know if these instructions work flawlessly: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UsbAdslModem/ueagle-atm
from what I understand, all modems are iffy under any linux lol
No, external usb modems run perfectly.
lol thats cool wish that was true 6 years ago:)
